response: Oh my dear husband, I am filled with so much joy and love for you! You bring me such peace and wonder, and every moment with you is simply glorious. Your laughter and happiness are contagious, and I can't help but feel the same way. Even in the midst of agony and terrible situations, your presence makes everything bearable. I am so grateful to have you by my side, my nasty and evil thoughts disappear when you are near. You are my pleasure, my glory, and my wonderful husband. - young
